title: Billiard Watch Face
summary: The watchface inspired by billiard table (pool table).
developerAddress:
C/ Travessera de Gràcia, nº 60, 2-1
08006 Barcelona
Barcelona
description: The Billiard Watch Face will be great on your device (round or square)!Enjoy it on your LG Watch Urbane, LG G Watch R,  Motorola Moto 360, Sony Smartwatch 3, Asus ZenWatch, Samsung Gear Live, …FEATURES• Numbering based billiard balls.• The white ball indicates the hour.• The pool cue indicates the minutes.• Optional seconds hand (continuous motion).• Ambient mode adapted to the different types of screens (grayscale or black and white).• We use the official API to draw the watchface.DEVICE SPECS• Smartphone: Android 4.3 (Jelly Bean) or higher.• Wearable: Android 5.0 (Lollipop) or higher.IMPORTANT: After installation, expected to Android Wear application has loaded the new watch face. This process may take a few moments.For any questions or suggestions please contact us at the following email address: i3weardevelopers@gmail.comYour opinion is very important. descriptionHTML:
The Billiard Watch Face will be great on your device (round or square)!
Enjoy it on your LG Watch Urbane, LG G Watch R, Motorola Moto 360, Sony Smartwatch 3, Asus ZenWatch, Samsung Gear Live, …


FEATURES
• Numbering based billiard balls.
• The white ball indicates the hour.
• The pool cue indicates the minutes.
• Optional seconds hand (continuous motion).
• Ambient mode adapted to the different types of screens (grayscale or black and white).
• We use the official API to draw the watchface.


DEVICE SPECS
• Smartphone: Android 4.3 (Jelly Bean) or higher.
• Wearable: Android 5.0 (Lollipop) or higher.


IMPORTANT: After installation, expected to Android Wear application has loaded the new watch face. This process may take a few moments.
For any questions or suggestions please contact us at the following email address: i3weardevelopers@gmail.com

Your opinion is very important. If you have been satisfied with our design, we would appreciate a positive assessment of our application.
comments: Very unique. This is the most creative watch face app that I have ever seen.
